:: _references

References¶

DBM+19

Arjun D Desai, Marco Barbieri, Valentina Mazzoli, Elka Rubin, Marianne S Black, Lauren E Watkins, Garry E Gold, Brian A Hargreaves, and Akshay S Chaudhari. Dosma: a deep-learning, open-source framework for musculoskeletal mri analysis. In Proc. Intl. Soc. Mag. Reson. Med, volume 27. 2019.

JMM+14

Caroline D Jordan, EJ McWalter, UD Monu, Ronald D Watkins, Weitian Chen, Neal K Bangerter, Brian A Hargreaves, and Garry E Gold. Variability of cubequant t1ρ, quantitative dess t2, and cones sodium mri in knee cartilage. Osteoarthritis and cartilage, 22(10):1559–1567, 2014.

LHBM08

Xiaojuan Li, Eric T Han, Reed F Busse, and Sharmila Majumdar. In vivo t1ρ mapping in cartilage using 3d magnetization-prepared angle-modulated partitioned k-space spoiled gradient echo snapshots (3d mapss). Magnetic Resonance in Medicine: An Official Journal of the International Society for Magnetic Resonance in Medicine, 59(2):298–307, 2008.

MJS+17

Uchechukwuka D Monu, Caroline D Jordan, Bonnie L Samuelson, Brian A Hargreaves, Garry E Gold, and Emily J McWalter. Cluster analysis of quantitative mri t2 and t1ρ relaxation times of cartilage identifies differences between healthy and acl-injured individuals at 3t. Osteoarthritis and cartilage, 25(4):513–520, 2017.

QWCB10

Yongxian Qian, Ashley A Williams, Constance R Chu, and Fernando E Boada. Multicomponent t2* mapping of knee cartilage: technical feasibility ex vivo. Magnetic resonance in medicine, 64(5):1426–1431, 2010.

SCGH17

B Sveinsson, AS Chaudhari, GE Gold, and BA Hargreaves. A simple analytic method for estimating t2 in the knee from dess. Magnetic resonance imaging, 38:63–70, 2017.
